name: Hole in Clone
description:
Hole in Clone is a golf-puzzle game where you can shot clones of yourself in order to reach the goal.
There are 12 levels, spikes, slowmo effect and guaranteed ragequit.
Share your final score into the comment!

This games was made in 14 days for the Gameloop #0 Jam where everyone shared the same graphic asset pack!

Follow me on twitter @hav24  

Controls:   
- Mouse to aim, click and hold to charge, release to shot.
- "R" to reset.
- "ESC" main menu.

Credits:       
Graphic asset by Kenney.nl. 
8bit sound effects made with Bfxr.
Background music by Playonloop.
Pixel font by Kenney.nl.

A game made by havana24.net
